QuestData.Title: Eliminate the Shadow Council
QuestData.Description: These ruins are full of Shadow Council adherents. We can't afford to let them scatter all over Draenor once Gul'dan has been dealt with.$B$BNo, we need to eliminate every one of them down to the last orc.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Shadow Council members at the Ruins of Ata'gar.
